channel.itunes:author: Strategy Gaming Dojo
channel.title: DC: Ardennes Offensive - Let's Play Tutorial | Part 5 - Through Lezy
channel.description: Our first chance to play Decisive Campaigns on the channel! A fantastic new game from VR Designs and Matrix Games. The fourth game in this series examines the Battle of the Bulge. We are playing a small scale scenario to learn the game together. #DecisiveCampaigns #ArdennesOffensive #VRDesigns #MatrixGames #Wargames #StrategyGamingDojo
